metricapp.service.repository

Class BusApprovedElementRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • metricapp.service.repository.BusApprovedElementRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BusApprovedElementInterface

    @Service
public class BusApprovedElementRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements BusApprovedElementInterface
    This repository offers method to send and grab our Elements to and from BUS.

    Supported items:

    • Metric
    • Question
    • MeasurementGoal
    Bus Storage contains only Approved Elements, and only Approved Elements can be sent to Bus.

      • sendApprovedElement

        public <T extends Element> Element sendApprovedElement(@Nonnull
                                              Element element,
                                              java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                            throws BadInputException,
                                   BusException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        This function send an approved Element like to Bus. There's a check for the state (must be Approved). It returns the updated Element. If the element has null busversion the element is created on bus, otherwise is updated.
        Specified by:
        sendApprovedElement in interface BusApprovedElementInterface
        Parameters:
        element - the Element to send to bus
        clazz - is the class of the element, like MeasurementGoal or Question
        Returns:
        the Element returned by the bus
        Throws:
        BadInputException - state not "Approved"
        BusException - error in interation with bus
        java.io.IOException - generic error mapping entities

      • getApprovedElement

        public <T extends Element> T getApprovedElement(@Nonnull
                                       PointerBus pointerBus,
                                       java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                                     throws BadInputException,
                                            BusException,
                                            java.io.IOException
        This function gathers Elements like MeasurementGoal, Metric and Question from the bus. If the pointerBus has null version, the last one is returned
        Specified by:
        getApprovedElement in interface BusApprovedElementInterface
        Parameters:
        pointerBus - the pointer of the entity requested
        clazz - the class of the element to gather, like MeasurementGoal.class, Metric.class
        Returns:
        return the elements returned by the bus. No null check control implemented
        Throws:
        BadInputException - if the pointer is not correct
        BusException - error in interation with bus
        java.io.IOException - generic mapping error.

        This function gathers an Array of Elements like MeasurementGoal, Metric and Question from the bus. If the pointerBus has null version, the last one is returned

      • fromElementToRichPointerBus

        public RichPointerBus fromElementToRichPointerBus(Element element)
                                           throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        This method maps Element to RichPointerBus to send it to bus, with a create or a update.

        TODO: change secure key in something safer (my idea is make a secret password in file /resource/application.properties. To generate this secret token we can do MD5(password XOR id)) In this way we have only to know the password, and not all the secret tokens.

        Specified by:
        fromElementToRichPointerBus in interface BusApprovedElementInterface
        Parameters:
        element - typically is of type MeasurementGoal, Metric or Question. Cast to Element is not necessary.
        Returns:
        RichPointerBus ready to be sent to bus
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the ObjectToString mapping is not possible

      • fromRichPointerBusToElement

        public Element fromRichPointerBusToElement(RichPointerBus pointer)
                                    throws BusException,
                                           java.io.IOException
        this method gets from RichPointerBus, typically received from the bus after an Update or a create action, and maps it to an Element like MeasurementGoal, Metric, Question. This method provides to save fields like secretToken in Element
        Specified by:
        fromRichPointerBusToElement in interface BusApprovedElementInterface
        Parameters:
        pointer, - typically received from bus. It Must contain fields getTypeObj and payload not null
        Returns:
        the element, you have to cast it to your Element. Class type is described like Enum in elementReturned.getEntityType()
        Throws:
        BusException - if typeobject is not correct, or supported. Exception message contains the value that triggers exception
        java.io.IOException - if the StringToObject is not possible
